question:
Nowadays many people complain that they have difficulties getting enough sleep.

What problems can lack of sleep cause?
What can be done about lack of sleep?
text: In recent days, more and more people are claiming that they have sleeping problems as they can not fall asleep easily. As a result, lack of sleep can be considered for two reasons and this essay will give some advice on these matters.

The cause of lack of sleep could consider both mental and physical problems. Firstly, people who did not have enough sleep might lose their concentration on work or study. They will find that their brain can not function properly which can cause several mistakes or injuries at work or school. Second, it is undeniable that our body will feel tired if it does not have a proper rest. When physical strength is down that could cause terrible accidents such as car drivers or sporters.

There are some solutions that could reduce the impact of sleeping problems. It is important to seek medical treatment, if people have difficulty falling asleep they should always check with the doctor first. Sometimes, it can easily cure if we have taken the proper medicines. In addition, some people fund that practising soft exercise could help to reduce the tiredness of muscle that helps people sleep well. Many researchers found that Yoga could help to reduce the pressure and reduce the nerves, which is a good way to help people to relax.

In conclusion, as humans, our body needs time to recover during our sleeping time. Although more and more people found it difficult to sleep well, it is believed that seeking help from a medical expert and practising Yoga might reduce this problem.
